Workflow.Name: DLP Request | Apply Policy to Environment (Child)
Workflow.Description: Helper function that takes the Power Platform Policy Id and an Environment Id as input, and applies the given policy to the given environment. It also removes the environment from all other "Include" type Policies and excludes it from all "Exclude" type Policies.

LocalizedName.description: DLP Request | Apply Policy to Environment (Child)

Description.description: Helper function that takes the Power Platform Policy Id and an Environment Id as input, and applies the given policy to the given environment. It also removes the environment from all other "Include" type Policies and excludes it from all "Exclude" type Policies.
